resources.string: 1. At a conference, 12 members shook hands with each other before and after the meeting. How many total number of hand shakes occurred?
2. Book is to Reading as Fork is to:

5. Mary, who is sixteen years old, is four times as old as her brother. How old will Mary be when she is twice as old as her brother?
6. Forest is to tree as tree is to ?

8. If all Bloops are Razzies and all Razzies are Lazzies, then all Bloops are definitely Lazzies?
